facts.value: Location: ~/Desktop/Tools/crawl4ai-scripts/. Command: /crawl. Supports: form login, cookies, tokens, OAuth, 2FA, natural language extraction with LLM. Version: v0.7.8. Tested and working.

Gemini API integrated with crawl4ai. API key: AIzaSyCwpp0YtdHB56WZ1bhtWdWrPqPS005I6U8. Files: gemini_config.py, GEMINI_FEATURES.md, test_gemini.py. Basic scraping tested and working. 60-80% cheaper than OpenAI. Free tier rate limits apply. URL context and grounding features documented.

patterns.solution: Use 10 parallel specialized agents: coordinator, agent-loop, hook-chain, memory, checkpoint, parallel/swarm, debug/ui-tests, reasoning/constitutional-ai, autonomous-execution, github-mcp. Each agent provides detailed line-by-line analysis.
Use incremental approach: implement functions, add CLI commands, test, document. Phases: 1) Git channels, checkpoints, file cache; 2) BM25 hybrid search; 3) AST code chunking; 4) Context budgeting
